      • die

        public void die​(@NotNull
                @NotNull String reason,
                boolean saveForMorning)
        Kill the person. Automatically syncs.
        Parameters:
        reason - The reason why the person died.
        saveForMorning - If true, the person's death will be revealed in the morning.

      • setTemporaryAttributes

        public void setTemporaryAttributes​(@Nullable
                                   Attributes atr)
        Set the person's temporary attributes. Unless null, this overrides the default attack.
        Parameters:
        atr - The player's temporary attributes.

      • clearTemporaryAttributes

        public void clearTemporaryAttributes()

      • isDisconnected

        public boolean isDisconnected()
        Has the user left the game server? Changes to false if the user joined back.

        It's called "isDisconnected" rather than "hasDisconnected" because the value can change if the person joins back, unlike hasJoined.
        Returns:
        True if the user left the game server.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        This method should be called when the person leaves the game server. It subsequently kills the person via suicide.

      • join

        public void join()
        This method should be called when the person either joins or rejoins the game server.

      • hasJoined

        public boolean hasJoined()
        Has the person joined the server? Will reamin true if the person disconnects the server.
        Returns:
        true if the user joined the game server at least once

        public void setTownEvent​(@Nullable
                         TownEvent e)
        Set the person's event.
        Parameters:
        e - The town event to be used
